title: Independent living centre [Serbian Version]
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Handicapped - Australia
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mentally handicapped
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Mentally handicapped - Care - Victoria
description: Outlines the highly specialised and unique services of the Independent Living Centre in Victoria which aims to assist people with disabilities to enhance their independence and quality of life by providing demonstrations, advice and information on a comprehensive range of aids and equipment for daily living. Narrated in Serbian.
